snp3.12:25.2: Aññāyupasame → aññāya upasame (bj, pts1) | paññāya upasame (s1-3)
snp3.12:42.4: Saṅkhyaṃ nopeti → saṅkhaṃ nopeti (bj) | saṅkhyannopeti (s1-3) | saṅkhaṃ na upeti (pts1)
snp3.12:61.2: Sampamūḷhetthaviddasu → sampamūḷhettha aviddasu (bj) | sampamūḷhettha aviddasū (pts1) | sammūḷhettha aviddasu (?)
